interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Looney Tunes:Spotlight Coll. Premiere Ed
Review Date: 2015/01/19
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Kids & Family
Product Description: ['Looney Tunes: Spotlight Collection, The Premiere Edition (Dbl DVD)', "They're the clown princes of animation. They're the international ambassadors of cartoon comedy. They're the fabulously funny friends you grew up with! And now, 28 of the very best animated shorts starring the very wackiest Warner Bros. cartoon characters have been rounded up on DVD for the first time ever in The Looney Tunes Premiere Collection! Just barely contained in two special edition discs, each specially selected short has been brilliantly restored and re-mastered to its original anvil-dropping, laughter-inducing glory! Featuring some of the very earliest, ground-breaking on-screen appearances of many all-time Looney Tunes favorites, it's an unprecedented animation celebration for cartoon-lovers eager to re-live the heady, hilarious, golden age of Warner Bros. animation! Sparkling with one unforgettable, landmark cartoon classic after another, there's Bugs Bunny's monstrously merry encounter with the tennis-shoe clad creature of Hair-Raising Hare. Wile E. Coyote and Roadrunner racing to cartoon immortality in Fast and Furryous. Oscar-winning animated gems, scenery-chewing Tazmanian Devils and much more! Plus, a dazzling array of totally Looney DVD bonus features!", ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.75 x 0.5 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2232461', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Color, Closed-captioned, Animated, Multiple Formats, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Run time': '3 hours and 27 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 14, 2004', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), Unqualified', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Much loved Christmas gift by child and parents.
Review Title: Cartoon collection
Rating: 5.0

Saw it years ago and with this viewing found it even more exciting and disturbing.  Very well acted and produced.
Thought provoking.
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English (UK) [CC]', 'English (US) [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian G. Hutton'], 'Producers': ['Elliott Kastner'], 'Starring': ['Richard Burton', 'Clint Eastwood', 'Mary Ure'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']}
Very exciting movie, very well done.  A movie I have seen before and will watch many more times.  Scenery spectacular.
Excellent movie
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ben Bolt', 'Paul Seed'], 'Producers': ['Mark Crowdy'], 'Starring': ['Martin Clunes', 'Caroline Catz'], 'Studio': ['Acorn Media']}
We find the Doc Martin series very interesting and more importantly very intertaining.  We have to be careful about when we watch because we cannot quit until we have seen all of the episodes in the season.  End up staying up very late sometimes because we cannot bear not to know what comes next!
Review of Season 5 Doc Martin

Love it.  Never miss it and watch episodes repeatedly.  Great character development, and scenery is spectacular.  Stories in episodes so interesting and entertertaining.
Doc Martin Season 4

Excellent quality streaming.  Very enjoyable science fiction and entertaining stories.  Enjoyed very much and intend to watch other seasons as well as rewatching most episodes.

Best of Warner Bros. 50 Cartoon Collection: Looney Tunes
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
['Best of Warner Bros. 50 Cartoon Collection - Looney Tunes (DVD)', 'It’s always “wabbit” season now that the best Looney tunes Cartoons from the Warner Bros. vault are available in this wild two-disc collection! Reunite with Bugs Bunny, Elmer Fudd, Porky Pig, Tweety Bird, Sylvester, Daffy Duck and all the Looney tunes gang in an animated assortment of hits that have tickled the funny bones of cartoon lovers for generations. There’s something for everyone in this must-own collection of 50 Looney tunes classics that helped contribute to 90years of Warner Bros. cartoon magic. It’s a timeless anthology for fans of all ages that will have you laughing long before “Tha-That-That’s All, Folds!”', ']]>']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** Continues to favor thought-provoking narratives exploring complex themes alongside a nostalgic appreciation for classic animation. The recent acquisition reflects a penchant for animated classics that blend humor and whimsical storytelling, appealing to both their adult sensibilities and childhood memories.

- **Quality Appreciation:** Maintains a strong preference for high-quality production and performances, recognizing the significance of talented directors and actors across various genres. Their rating demonstrates a consistent engagement with well-crafted narratives that deliver emotional depth.

- **Viewing Experience:** Enjoys a diverse range of storytelling, revisiting cherished titles while embracing nostalgic content that resonates across generations. This indicates a broader scope in their appreciation for character-driven and memorable animated experiences.

- **Language and Accessibility:** Continues to seek English-language content with available subtitles for enhanced comprehension, gravitating towards options that ensure clarity in dialogue.

- **Overall Ratings:** Regularly awards high ratings, confirming a sophisticated taste in cinematic excellence that encompasses both classic and contemporary works. Their engagement with animated collections showcases a delightful balance between tradition and innovation, reflecting a discerning and versatile entertainment palate.
